com.interfac.usermanager.user.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interfac.usermanager.user.controllers.UserController

  • @Controller
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles mapping the HTTP requests to the views after calling the UserService for processing the needed service.
    Author:
    Ali
    See Also:
    UserRepository, UserService

      • welcome

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String welcome(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Handle "/" request page. Returns a welcomeMessage variable populated with the currently logged in username extracted from the Authentication object.
        Parameters:
        model - will carry the welcomeMessage var to the view.
        Returns:
        string resolved to the view path.

      • listUsers

        @RequestMapping(value="/users")
public java.lang.String listUsers(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Handle "/users" request. Returns a model attributes back to the view.
        • usersList : list of User objects, sent to the view to populate the table.
        Parameters:
        model - will carry the usersList var to the view.
        Returns:
        string resolved to the view path.

      • accessDeniedController

        @RequestMapping(value="/access_denied",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String accessDeniedController()
        Handles AccessDeniedException page. forwards the user to the custom access_denied page.
        Returns:
        string resolved to the view path.

      • registerUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/add",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String registerUser(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                                                                       User user,
                                                                                                       org.springframework.validation.Errors errors,
                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                                throws UsernameExistsException
        This method handles user registration and user updating. First it checks for validation errors, if present it returns the regestration_form with errors object. it then checks if the operation is an edit (userId != 0, user not new!), if so, i calls the editUser service method. and checks if the user is editing his own profile or he is an ADMIN and is editing other users. and redirects accordingly. if the operation is a new registration, it is delegated to registerUser service method and user is redirected to the users page.
        Parameters:
        user -
        errors -
        model -
        Returns:
        string resolved to the view path.
        Throws:
        UsernameExistsException - custom exception, handled by sending a validation error message to the registration_form view

      • deleteUser

        @Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
 @RequestMapping(value="/users/delete/{userId}")
public java.lang.String deleteUser(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                                                                                                   int userId)
        handles requests for user deletion. Redirects to the users view page only available for users with ADMIN authority
        Parameters:
        userId -
        Returns:

      • editUser

        @Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
 @RequestMapping(value="/users/edit/{userId}")
public java.lang.String editUser(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                                                                                               int userId,
                                                                                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        handles request for user editing. only available for users with ADMIN authority
        Parameters:
        userId -
        model - to be populated with the user to be edited.
        Returns:
        string to the registration page.
